sense.def: Illness Sign of dry retching appearing as major illness sign of a pathological condition brought forth by drinking water when one has been affected by a warmth disease with heat and fever. Shang han zong bing lun 傷寒總病論 5: 温病有熱，飲水，暴冷啘，茅根葛根湯 , “If in the case of warmth disease with fever one drinks water and then experiences violent cold retching , [this is to be treated] with a decoction with mao gen and ge gen ”.
